Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Adabco Boutique Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Adelaide, walking distance from Tandanya and close to East End Cafe Precinct. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Ayers House Museum and Osmond Gardens.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 69 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens. 32-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. This Victorian hotel also features a television in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Continental breakfasts are served on weekdays for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Continental breakfasts are served on weekdays for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Tandanya - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
East End Cafe Precinct - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Ayers House Museum - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Osmond Gardens - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Himeji Gardens - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Victoria Square - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Adelaide Town Hall - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Rundle Mall - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
University of Adelaide - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Art Gallery of South Australia - 1 km / 0.6 mi
South Australian Museum - 1 km / 0.6 mi
State Library of South Australia - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Westpac House - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Adelaide Central Market - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Adelaide War Memorial - 1 km / 0.7 mi

The preferred airport for Adabco Boutique Hotel is Adelaide, SA (ADL) - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
